title: Can Adele's new music be heard in TV teaser?
text:

Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Can Adele's new music be heard in TV teaser? Lauren Moraski, CBS News 1:36 p.m. EDT October 19, 2015 Singer/songwriter Adele attends UJA-Federation Of New York Music Visionary Of The Year Award Luncheon at The Pierre Hotel on June 21, 2013 in New York City. (Photo: Slaven Vlasic, Getty Images) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Are we finally getting some new music from Adele? 
It's been nearly five years since her last album, "21," surfaced - and now the Grammy winner might finally have some new tunes for fans. 
On Sunday, the British songstress unveiled what appears to be the first snippet of new material from her upcoming third album. The music appeared in a TV commercial that played in the U.K. during an episode of "The X Factor." Snippet from Adele's new album. pic.twitter.com/ThSvnRREaB â€” My Daughter's Army (@mydaughtersarmy) October 18, 2015 
The lyrics were: "Hello/It's me/I was wondering if after all these years you'd like to meet/To go over everything/They say that time's supposed to heal ya/But I ain't done much healing ... " 
The ad ended with an ellipses. Oh, Adele -- making us wonder. 
Adele's team has yet to confirm the news.
